statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE password IS NOT NULL
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE '%smith%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email NOT LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE full_name='John Doe';
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT full_name FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, full_name FROM users WHERE full_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, username, full_name, email FROM users ORDER BY full_name DESC, user_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, smart_lock_id, access_level FROM access_control ORDER BY user_id ASC, smart_lock_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM access_control ac JOIN users u ON ac.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT lock_name, location FROM smart_locks WHERE location = 'Home' ORDER BY lock_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT lock_name, location FROM Locks WHERE is_locked = TRUE
SELECT system_name, location FROM SecuritySystems WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT username, email, phone_number, date_created FROM UserProfiles
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, phone_number FROM UserProfiles WHERE username LIKE '%smith%' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM Locks WHERE location = 'Main Entrance' AND is_locked = FALSE;
SELECT system_name, location, status FROM SecuritySystems WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT user_id, full_name, age FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT lock_name, location, is_locked FROM smart_locks WHERE is_locked = true;
SELECT roles.role_name, roles.description, users.username FROM roles JOIN users ON roles.role_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT u.username, u.role, p.full_name FROM users u JOIN user_profiles p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.age > 30
SELECT l.lock_name, l.location, a.access_time FROM smart_locks l JOIN access_logs a ON l.lock_id = a.lock_id WHERE a.access_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY a.access_time DESC
SELECT r.role_name, r.description, u.username FROM roles r JOIN users u ON r.role_name = u.role
